meaningMnemonic: What do you <kanji>wear</kanji> to <kanji>heal</kanji> a really serious injury? An <vocabulary>adhesion</vocabulary>. Okay, so you don't actually wear these, but your body makes them for your insides to wear so you can heal. Nice job insides!
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
